description: This file defines a theme class `NeonFunTheme` for a Flutter app, providing a custom light theme with specific color schemes, styles for app bars, text, cards, buttons, chips, floating action buttons, and helper methods like a header gradient and neon glow shadows.

classes.name: NeonFunTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to generate a customized Flutter theme with neon style elements.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with a light color scheme and styles fitting the neon theme.

methods.name: playfulHeaderGradient
methods.description: Provides a linear gradient intended for headers, combining primary, secondary, and red colors with opacity.

methods.name: neonGlow
methods.description: Generates a list of BoxShadow objects to create a soft neon glow effect with a specified color.
